welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ad Diraz, Bahrain! Known for its historical charm and rich culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bahrain International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bahrain International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time or data limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of King Abdulaziz AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Royal Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used for members of the royal family and VIPs.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
